data.feedback: The plan comprehensively covers all user requirements. Sharing UI and Goals UI already exist and are correctly identified for modification rather than recreation. New features (health integration, real-time WebSocket, push notifications) are properly scoped. Backend Socket.io events align with frontend entity definitions. Minor issues (duplicate deps, package choice) don't block implementation.
issues: Minor: Duplicate dependency epic-realtime-websocket-client in some epics
Recommendation: Consider socket_io_client package instead of web_socket_channel for full Socket.io compatibility
suggestions: Add socket_io_client to dependencies instead of/alongside web_socket_channel
